title: Windham Professionals Adds New Telehealth Program for Employees
text:
Windham Professionals Inc. 
SALEM, N.H. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Windham Professionals , a leader in accounts receivable management and customer care services, has contracted with American Well , a national telehealth services provider, to offer its telehealth app Amwell as a fast and inexpensive way for Windham employees to access healthcare. Regardless of their enrollment in the company’s traditional healthcare programs, all Windham employees and their immediate families now have online entrance to telehealth services 24/7 and 365 days a year. 
“We are very excited to be able to offer this amazing program to our entire Windham team,” stated Christine Timmins Barry, Windham’s President and CEO. “Windham’s investment in programs like this shows how we continue to raise the bar on support for our staff. Taking good care of employees is a cornerstone of our providing clients with the absolute highest quality of services.” 
Amwell users simply go online through a computer or mobile device, review the credentials and backgrounds of the providers available, and select the medical professional they would like to speak with. Utilizing a video consultation, the licensed physician or nurse practitioner can evaluate, diagnose, and treat a wide variety of illnesses. They are even able to send a prescription to the patient’s preferred pharmacy. No more dragging feverish children out in inclement weather or sitting for hours in Emergency Rooms in the middle of the night waiting to be seen. Windham is ensuring that their employees and immediate families have essential healthcare when and where they need it. 
“We share Windham’s high regard for employees and aim to improve health and work productivity by offering the best medical care,” said Danielle Russella, President, Customer Solutions, American Well. “With this collaboration, Windham employees can now download the Amwell app and in minutes be connected to a doctor of their choosing for a visit, getting the care they need, right when they need it." 
About Windham Professionals Inc. Windham Professionals innovates, improves and advances our client’s business through Business Process Services that span the entire order-to-cash life cycle while providing cost reductions and increased efficiencies. Windham also provides exceptional customer contact services that extend customer loyalty and grow revenues. Our focus on experience, knowledge and teamwork start with each and every employee and extend through our long-term relationships with our clients. Established in 1982, Windham is based out of Salem, New Hampshire with offices located throughout the United States. For more information, visit our website at www.windhampros.com . 
About American Well American Well has delivered healthcare into people’s homes and workplaces for close to a decade. American Well’s consumer service, Amwell , connects people with board-certified doctors, dieticians, and psychotherapists for video visits via smartphone, tablet, kiosk, phone, or desktop. Amwell is the #1 most downloaded telehealth app and averages a 4.8 out of 5 Star rating by consumers. American Well serves the nation’s top health systems and health plans, more than 600 major employers and more than 25 million covered consumers.
